experience.name: Full Stack Developer

experience.name: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Provide two mobile applications, where the first aims to monitor the blind by the family concerned and the second aims to activate the alarm on the cellphone if Arduino gets a predetermined value if the blind person passes a hole, will hit a wall, and others.

experience.name: Project Manager

In order for the processing time to be efficient, every two days a discussion will be held together with the team.
